Articles.Content:
I would like to introduce a little promo vid i threw together that showcases one of the competing sides 'Criax Industries'. We will be releasing this series in the coming month or so once all the infrastructure has been put up. My Pvp series will be a asynchronous file swap game where two competing corporations battle in the sky's over Kerbin.

Here's the promo teaser trailer for the corporation that i will be controlling.
Wish you all the best with this,something to fill the hole macey left:P

Introducing the Criax Industries 'Dragoon' Heavy Assault Craft. Seen here with a full payload of kinetic projectiles and solar panels extended

Second on our product line. The newest edition to Criax's inventory. We proudly introduce the 'Firestorm' Heavy Bomber.

This late comer to our product range was firstly intended as a high atmosphere saturation bomber but new developments in technology have aloud our R&D department to breathe new life into this project.

She is now able to carry a variety of projectiles including anti capital, anti ground and anti fighter. Needless to say, Jebadia cant wait to get his hands on this piece of tech.

Last but not least, we would like to introduce the CI-P (Criax Industries) Dreadnought. A side picture of the mighty Dreadnoughts reinforced side armour.

Results of its kinetic and explosive resistance are still classified.

And as ever Criax Industries would like to say: Build creatively. Fly with dedication. And dream big.
